title: Move xlf sync tasks into xliff parser repository and its nuget package
body:
We currently have some [wrapper tasks](https://github.com/Microsoft/msbuild/tree/master/build/LocalizationTasks) over the [xliff parser](https://github.com/fmuecke/XliffParser) apis to:
- keep xlf files in sync with neutral resources
- generate localized resx

We should move over / contribute the wrapper tasks into the xliff parser repository and use them via nuget packages.

nodes.body: Not needed as xlf sync moved to xlifftasks
